author: VNExplorer
title: iOS 18.4 traz oito novos emojis para usuários de iPhone; veja - VNExplorer
text: A Apple liberou, nesta terça-feira (1º), a atualização do iOS 18.4, e uma das novidades que mais chamaram a atenção foi a chegada de oito novos emojis ao teclado do iPhone. Os ícones foram aprovados previamente pelo Unicode Consortium e agora passam a fazer parte do catálogo oficial do sistema. Os novos emojis incluem representações curiosas e expressivas, como: Rosto com olheirasImpressão digitalÁrvore sem folhasNaboHarpaPá Notícias ao Minuto © Emojipedia Leia Também: ChatGPT sofre instabilidade após sobrecarga de acessos em busca de filtro do Studio Ghibli

author: Brian Neeley
title: 2 stocks to buy now that could skyrocket in 2024
text:
“Find out where the world is going and get there as fast as possible.” –David Gardner, co-founder, The Motley Fool
The best investors can recognize transformative technologies before others. This is a fascinating skill that can help you make huge wealth in the stock market.
If you want to learn early about powerful trends and benefit from exciting technological advancements like artificial intelligence (AI) and electric aircraft, read on. The two companies that follow are poised to disrupt the markets in a big way while also potentially delivering great returns to their shareholders.
symbolic
AI is coming to a warehouse near you. symbolic (NASDAQ: SYM) is using cutting-edge AI and robotics technology to help companies reduce their logistics costs by automating their supply chains.
Symbotik's system can reduce its customers' warehouse-space needs by up to 60%. Instead of hours, trailers can be loaded in minutes. Orders can be fulfilled with 99.99% accuracy and low inventory requirements. The company estimates that its $50 million purchase of one module could reduce operating expenses by $10 million annually for 25 years.
These benefits are not escaping the attention of major retailers. grocery giant albertsons And Target has deployed Symbiotic's systems in its warehouses. wal-martMeanwhile, it is integrating Symbiotic's technology across all 42 of its regional distribution centers to strengthen its inventory management and fulfillment operations.
Predictably, given the speed and efficiency its technology can provide, Symbiotic's sales are increasing. Its revenue rose 98% to $1.2 billion in the fiscal year ended Sept. 30. Even better, Symbiotic's profit margins are improving as it grows its revenue base.
The company has not yet achieved profitability based on generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP). However, it generated positive adjusted EBITDA (earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization) for the first time in the fourth quarter of its fiscal year. It expects this positive trend to continue in 2024 as well. The company estimates it will generate $14 million in adjusted EBITDA in the first quarter.
the story continues
Looking ahead, Symbiotic's profits could grow rapidly in the coming years. The robotics leader estimates its long-term market opportunity at a staggering $350 billion.
Archer Aviation
Your next trip to the airport may take much less of your time. Archer Aviation (NYSE:ACHR) is working to make flying taxis a reality, and it's made more progress than you might expect. Archer is developing an all-electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) vehicle. Its Midnight Aircraft is designed to usher in a new wave of high-speed urban travel.
Capable of flying at speeds of up to 150 mph, Archer's EV can avoid congested roads and replace exhausting 60-minute journeys by car with safe 10-minute air taxi flights. And Midnight's all-electric design creates zero operating emissions, making it a more environmentally friendly option.
Not surprisingly, given these advantages, transportation industry giants are willing to partner with Archer. boeing, United AirlinesAnd Stellantis All have acquired equity stakes in the EV upstart. Archer has received over $1.1 billion in funding from these and other high-profile backers.
Even better, Stellantis is helping Archer expand manufacturing operations at its plant in Covington, Georgia. Initial production of the Midnight aircraft is expected to begin in mid-2024.
Archer Aviation's Midnight EV. Image source: Archer Aviation.
Meanwhile, United Airlines has agreed to buy $1.5 billion worth of Archer aircraft. The airline is also collaborating with Archer to establish the first commercial electric air-taxi route in the US
These transportation leaders are rightly impressed by Archer's growth potential. It is estimated that the urban air-mobility industry will reach $1 trillion by 2040 and $9 trillion by 2050. Morgan Stanley,
Archer is on track to begin commercial operations by 2025. Its sales should increase rapidly soon after this. Today, you have the opportunity to buy shares in this innovative upstart that is poised to lead a potentially multitrillion-dollar industry, while its total market cap is still just under $2 billion.
Should you invest $1,000 in Archer Aviation now?
Before buying stock in Archer Aviation, consider this:

author: @Metro_PR
title: Colapsa puente en Patillas por mal tiempo y fuertes lluvias
text: Las autoridades informaron este viernes, primero de noviembre de 2024, que debido a las inclemencias del mal tiempo que se ha registrado durante las últimas horas, un puente colapsó en el municipio de Patillas. De acuerdo al informe de la Uniformada, los hechos se dieron en el barrio Jacaboa, sector Higüero, del dicho pueblo. PUBLICIDAD El puente se encuentra intransitable. Colapsa parcialmente otro puente en Humacao Agentes, adscritos al distrito de Humacao del Negociado de la Policía de Puerto Rico, dieron a conocer este viernes, que un puente colapsó parcialmente en el sector El Puerto, del pueblo de Humacao, luego de fuertes lluvias en la zona. Las autoridades exhortaron a los conductores que usan la dicha vía de rodaje, que tomen vías alternas y tengan precaución en el área. Serie de vaguadas y humedad debido a un frente frío continuará afectando la zona Una serie de vaguadas en niveles altos continuará generando alta inestabilidad en la atmósfera, la cual se encuentra saturada de humedad debido a un frente frío que se retira lentamente de la región. Estas condiciones mantendrán un patrón de lluvias intensas hasta al menos mediados de la próxima semana. PUBLICIDAD La vigilancia de posibles inundaciones repentinas permanecerá vigente hasta el sábado, mientras que los vientos del sur disminuirán gradualmente durante el fin de semana, permitiendo que vientos ligeros a moderados del este retornen a inicios de la próxima semana. Las condiciones marítimas se mantendrán peligrosas hasta el domingo, con un alto riesgo de corrientes de resaca hasta el lunes. Para hoy, nublado con lluvias y tormentas eléctricas aisladas. Temperaturas máximas alrededor de 85°F. Vientos del este de 5 a 10 mph. Probabilidad de lluvia 90 %. Esta noche, mayormente nublado con tormentas eléctricas aisladas y lluvias dispersas. Mínimas alrededor de 77 °F. Vientos del sureste de 5 mph. Probabilidad de lluvia 80 %. El sábado, parcialmente nublado en la mañana, luego nublado. Tormentas aisladas. Lluvias dispersas en la mañana, aumentando a lluvias numerosas por la tarde. Temperaturas máximas alrededor de 91 °F. Vientos del sureste de 10 a 15 mph. Probabilidad de lluvia 70 %. Inundada carretera PR-3 en Yabucoa Agentes, adscritos al distrito de Yabucoa del Negociado de la Policía de Puerto Rico, informaron este viernes, primero de noviembre de 2024, que debido a las inclemencias del mal tiempo, en el kilómetro 95.3 de la carretera PR-3 cerca de las antiguas facilidades de la Central Azucarera de Yabucoa, se encuentra intransitable ya que la vía de rodaje está inundada. Se les exhorta a los conductores que tomen vías alternas, como la autopista PR-53 y carretera 182 y precaución en el área

author: archyde
title: Ukrainian armed forces announce attack on Russian troops in Kusk region with US bombs
text:
2024-08-22 19:11:00
Nikolay Oreshchuk, Air Force Commander of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, said that on August 22, the Ukrainian army attacked Russian positions in the Kursk region with American bombs.
Posted by soldiers video which, according to him, depicts the defeat of a platoon stronghold of the Russian Armed Forces. “The drone control center, electronic warfare units, equipment, weapons and up to 40 Russian military personnel were attacked,” the Ukrainian Armed Forces said in a statement.
The Russian Defense Ministry has not commented on reports of attacks and use of U.S. weapons by Ukrainian armed forces.
For a long time, U.S. authorities have not allowed Ukraine to use U.S. weapons against targets on Russian soil. In the spring of 2024, against the background of the Russian armed forces’ attack on the Kharkiv region, the White House allowed Kiev to use American weapons to launch strikes on the border areas to resist Russian artillery fire. Judging from Western media reports, U.S. officials have adopted similar logic regarding the actions of the Ukrainian armed forces in the Kursk region. notes “British Broadcasting Corporation”.
Ukraine’s offensive in the Kursk region has continued since August 6. go through data media During operations on Russian territory, the Ukrainian Armed Forces used British Challenger 2 tanks, and drones received from the UK played a key role in the promotion.
In the context of the offensive of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, how Wrote The Washington Post reported that Kiev asked Washington to allow Ukraine to use long-range ATACMS missiles to attack Russian airports. Vladimir Zelensky also hold a meeting U.S. senators have called on the White House to allow Ukraine’s armed forces to use long-range missiles to carry out “a deeper strike” against Russia.
Listen to the podcast “What Happened” to learn how the Ukrainian Armed Forces offensive in the Kursk region developed
How far have Ukrainian armed forces advanced in the Kursk region? Why has the Russian Federation still not established a defense line there?
1724359844

author: Dennis Schirrmacher
title: Sicherheitspatches: Angreifer können Schadcode auf GitLab-Servern verankern | heise online
text:
close notice
This article is also available in English . It was translated with technical assistance and editorially reviewed before publication.
Don’t show this again .
Angreifer können an mehreren Schwachstellen in der Softwareentwicklungsplattform GitLab ansetzen. Davon sind die Community- und Enterprise-Editionen betroffen. Sicherheitsupdates sind verfügbar.
Anzeige Instanzen absichern In einer Warnmeldung versichern die Verantwortlichen , dass GitLab.com bereits abgesichert sei. Sie empfehlen, dass Admins von On-premise-Instanzen die reparierten Ausgaben 18.0.6, 18.1.4 oder 18.2.2 zeitnah installieren sollten. Noch gibt es keine Informationen, ob bereits Attacken laufen.
Vier Sicherheitslücken (CVE-2025-7734, CVE-2025-7739, CVE-2025-6186, CVE-2025-8094) sind mit dem Bedrohungsgrad " hoch " eingestuft. An diesen Stellen können Angreifer in erster Linie für XSS-Attacken ansetzen. In einem Fall können sie Schadcode sogar dauerhaft auf verwundbaren Servern ablegen (stored XSS).
In den anderen Fällen ist unter anderem die Authentifizierung umgehbar (CVE-2024-10219 " mittel "). Neben dem Schließen von Sicherheitslücken haben die Entwickler in den aktuellen Ausgaben noch einige Bugs beseitigt.
Videos by heise
mehr Videos
Zuletzt haben Sicherheitsupdates GitLab vor möglichen Accountübernahmen geschützt.
( des )
Dieser Link ist leider nicht mehr gültig. Links zu verschenkten Artikeln werden ungültig, wenn diese älter als 7 Tage sind oder zu oft aufgerufen wurden.

author: Manuelfvhra Ampedpages Com
title: Foundation Repair Mastery: Making Certain Security for Your Home
text:
Specialist Structure Fixing: Making Sure a Solid and Secure Home
Expert Structure Repair Service: Guaranteeing a Strong and Secure Home.
Maintaining a steady and solid structure is important for the architectural integrity of any kind of home. With time, numerous elements such as soil activity, water damage, or bad construction can cause foundation concerns. Identifying the indications of structure damages and without delay resolving them is critical to protect against more deterioration and make certain a safe living environment.
This is where professional foundation fixing enters play. By engaging the solutions of skilled and knowledgeable specialists, homeowners can relax guaranteed that their structure problems will be attended to successfully and effectively. From conducting a detailed examination to utilizing proper repair work techniques, these specialists possess the knowledge and tools to bring back the security and safety of a home's structure.
Investing in professional structure repair uses various advantages, consisting of the conservation of residential or commercial property value, prevention of additional damages, and assurance. Do not compromise on the safety and security and stability of your home - trust fund the specialists to make sure a solid structure that stands the test of time.
Signs of Foundation Damage
Foundation damage can be determined through a mindful analysis of visible fractures, uneven floorings, and misaligned doors and windows. These indications are indicative of underlying concerns that may endanger the architectural integrity of a building. Visible cracks in the walls, specifically those that are diagonal or broader than a quarter of an inch, are a clear sign of structure issues. These fractures can be located in both the interior and outside walls and usually begin at the edges of windows and doors. In addition, unequal floors can also indicate structure damages. Floors that incline or droop in certain areas may be a result of moving or settling structures. Misaligned doors and home windows, which may be hard to open up or shut effectively, can be a sign of structure issues. When the foundation settles or changes, it can trigger the frameworks of home windows and doors to end up being misaligned, making them stick or otherwise fit appropriately in their frames. It is important to acknowledge these indicators of structure damages beforehand to avoid more deterioration and ensure the safety and security of the structure.
Relevance of Prompt Repair Works
Among the major factors motivate repair services are vital is due to the fact that structure issues tend to get worse gradually. Small fractures or small shifts in the structure can rapidly escalate right into significant architectural issues if left unaddressed. By taking instant action, property owners can avoid the problem from coming to be a lot more pricey and severe to deal with.
Furthermore, by resolving structure troubles promptly, property owners can save cash in the future. Delaying repair services may bring about extra extensive damage, needing a lot more costly and complex repair service techniques. By tackling the issue beforehand, home owners can decrease the scope of the repairs and potentially stay clear of more substantial expenditures.
Professional Structure Evaluation
To ensure the exact analysis of any prospective foundation problems, an expert inspection by a qualified expert is needed. During the examination, a trained expert will completely take a look at the structure, determining any kind of indications of damage or damage.
The examination procedure typically entails an aesthetic examination, as well as making use of specialized tools and tools to determine the security and stability of the structure. The professional assessor will
hometry to find typical indicators of structure problems, such as fractures, uneven settling, bowing or leaning walls, and wetness issues. They will likewise examine for indications of water damages, as this can considerably impact the security of the structure.
Common Foundation Repair Approaches
One essential aspect
more helpful hintsof keeping a solid and secure home is carrying out common structure repair work methods. When it comes to structure repair work, there are a number of usual techniques made use of by professionals to address numerous problems. By utilizing these usual foundation fixing approaches, homeowners can make sure the durability and security of their homes.
Benefits of Specialist Structure Fixing
An additional advantage of professional foundation repair service is using innovative tools and tools. These devices are especially designed for foundation repair services and enable the specialists to work effectively and properly. By utilizing the appropriate equipment, they can accurately lug and diagnose the issue out the needed repairs with accuracy.
Furthermore, specialist structure repair can save homeowners time and cash over time. By resolving structure issues without delay and correctly, experts can protect against additional damages and pricey repair services down the line. They can likewise give guarantees for their job, offering homeowners comfort recognizing that their structure remains in good hands.
Final Thought
In final thought, professional foundation repair service is vital for making sure a strong and safe and secure home. An expert structure inspection is essential in precisely analyzing the
moredegree of the damages and figuring out the most suitable repair service techniques.
When it comes to foundation repair service, there are numerous usual methods used by professionals to deal with various concerns.Professional foundation repair work provides countless benefits for property owners, ensuring the stability and structural stability of their homes for years to come. By resolving structure concerns promptly and correctly, professionals can avoid additional damages and costly repair work down the line.In verdict, professional foundation fixing is essential for ensuring a strong and protected home. author: Mark Fowser
title: Sponsor pulls controversial county mass rezoning ordinance | The Latest from WDEL News | wdel.com
text: A much-debated mass rezoning ordinance in New Castle County will be withdrawn, according to its sponsor. Councilman David Tackett said Thursday that concerns raised by the public and by County Executive Matt Meyer have led him to take the ordinance off the table. Tackett is asking that the County Land Use Department present alternative paths forward during the Land Use Committee meeting scheduled for February 6th. The ordinance would be formally withdrawn at County Council's meeting February 13th. Tackett said he believes a new approach could break up the proposed rezonings into manageable parts that can be "more fully and expeditiously considered by County Council, as well as the public" “I’ve heard all the public has to say and feel that it is of the utmost importance that we step back and re-evaluate. I feel that this is in the best interests of the County and its residents," Tackett said in a statement. Tackett also called for "increased involvement of surrounding communities and a more robust effort to engage the public with the parcels that impact the quality of life."

author: 南方财经网
title: 湖北荆州发布暴雨红色预警 _ 东方财富网
text:
南方财经5月8日电，湖北省荆州市气象台2025年5月8日7时2分升级发布暴雨红色预警信号：过去1小时石首团山站和六虎山站降雨量达50毫米。目前强降雨云团持续影响石首南部，预计未来3小时，石首南部乡镇仍有50毫米以上降雨，最大小时雨强可达30-50毫米，伴有雷电，阵风6-8级，城乡暴雨积涝、中小河流洪水风险高，请注意防范。
（文章来源：南方财经网）

author: Rubén Pacheco
title: El césped de un campo de fútbol de Nou Barris pone en jaque a los futbolistas: siete lesiones en 12 partidos
text:
Miedo, entre jugadores y técnicos, cuando comienza a rodar el balón. Ese es el sentimiento que se ha instaurado en el campo de fútbol de Ciutat Meridiana , después de que el pasado mes de octubre estrenara césped.
En lugar de ser una mejora para la instalación, el nuevo verde ha ocasionado una plaga de lesiones , convirtiéndose en un peligro para los jugadores que disputan los encuentros en este equipamiento de Nou Barris .
El Racing Vallbona CF , que juega actualmente en la instalación, expone sus dudas sobre la homologación de esta hierba artificial, y reclama al Ayuntamiento que la sustituya para evitar que siga provocando bajas en las plantillas.
Siete lesionados Manel Retamero, presidente del club , explica que el equipo ha denunciado las condiciones en las que se encuentra el terreno de juego tras el cambio de césped. "Los jugadores se sentían incómodos. En 12 partidos, se han lesionado cuatro jugadores del primer equipo, dos juveniles y otro de un equipo visitante ", lamenta.
Entrenamiento en el campo de Ciutat Meridiana RACING VALLBONA CF
La coincidencia de la tipología de lesión, además, resulta un motivo más para poner el foco sobre el verde de Ciutat Meridiana. "Se han producido lesiones de ligamentos cruzados mientras jugaban aquí", señala el presidente.
Homologación Los materiales utilizados no han ayudado a mejorar el campo. Según Retamero, el cambio "del caucho a la tierra de coco ", sumada a la " falta de riego " derivada de las restricciones por la sequía, han provocado que el verde esté " muy seco, con mucha tierra ".
Desde el club apuntan a la posibilidad de que este césped no esté "homologado según la normativa de la FIFA ", por lo que reclaman que un responsable de la empresa instaladora corrobore si el verde sigue, o no, esta reglamentación.
Cumpla o no estos estándares, Retamero reclama que el Ayuntamiento cambie el césped para evitar futuras lesiones entre los jugadores que disputen sus encuentros en esta instalación.
Revisión del césped Javier Barreña, consejero portavoz del PP en Nou Barris , trasladó la cuestión al Consejo de Distrito celebrado este jueves, donde reclamó la "revisión d el césped" y su homologación.
El regidor de Nou Barris, Xavier Marcé , ha eludido dar respuesta a la petición popular en la sesión plenaria de distrito.
Plan 'renove' La sustitución del césped del campo de Ciutat Meridiana forma parte de un plan renove municipal que ha incluido cambios en varios terrenos de juego, y que en esta instalación de Nou Barris se materializó a finales del pasado mes de septiembre.
AJ BCN
Collboni impulsa un plan 'renove' millonario para los campos de fútbol de Barcelona Según informó el consistorio, se trata de un césped de " última generación que garantiza la seguridad de los jugadores ". Respecto a la ausencia de caucho, el Ayuntamiento destacó la "reducción del impacto ambiental", que facilita el cumplimiento de la " normativa europea sobre la reducción de microplásticos que entrará en vigor en 2030 ".
